name: KubeflowExperimentRun
description: Create an Experiment and Run with Kubeflow
author: CSE-DevOps
instanceNameFormat: Create an experiment and a run

inputs.name: kubeflowEndpoint
inputs.label: Kubeflow API Endpoint Base URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Kubeflow API endpoint base URL format http://yourURL/

inputs.name: bearerToken
inputs.label: Bearer Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do not input raw tokens. Read more on how to handle secrets https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/process/variables?view=azure-devops&tabs=yaml%2Cbatch#secret-variables

inputs.name: pipeline
inputs.label: Pipeline Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Kubeflow pipeline name. Only required if making a new run.

inputs.name: useDefaultVersion
inputs.label: Use Default Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, will use the version name of the Kubeflow pipeline. Only required if making a new run.

inputs.name: pipelineVersion
inputs.label: Pipeline Version Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pipeline version name. Only required if making a new run.

inputs.name: createNewRun
inputs.label: Create New Pipeline Run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Create a new pipeline run from agent job.

inputs.name: runName
inputs.label: Run Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the new pipeline run.

inputs.name: runDescription
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Description for the new pipeline run.

inputs.name: waitForRunToFinish
inputs.label: Wait for run to complete
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the task will monitor the runs status and fail if the run fails, on agent job.

inputs.name: experiment
inputs.label: Experiment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose to create a new experiment or use an existing one.

inputs.name: experimentName
inputs.label: Experiment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name a new experiment, or choose an existing experiment.
